item.source: Running a server ive already compiled

item.title: Running a server ive already compiled
item.dc:creator: @weaving8 weaving8
item.description:
@weaving8 wrote:

hi just 1 tiny problem i have set my complied right but now my when i click runserver.bat a black screen comes and blinks less than a second

my complile is set to


@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Running a server ive already compiled
